name: Nginx Web Server
description: Ensures the Nginx web server is running.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active nginx >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then if service nginx status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart nginx || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then service nginx restart || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active nginx >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
